TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RuleSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class RuleSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 事件規則。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event rules.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件規則會決定哪一個提供者引發的事件，使用一個設定檔。Event rules determine which event, using which profile, is fired to which provider. ## Examples 下列的組態檔案摘錄會示範如何以宣告方式指定的屬性類別。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify the properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和設定的值型別。The following code example shows how to create and set the values of the type. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別參考的格式，如下所示 （在方括號中的項目並非必要）：*命名空間*。*Typename*， *Assemblyname*[，] [版本 = x] [文化特性 = y] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 比方說，「 ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType，Example.Assembly，版本 = %assembly_version%，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = %microsoft_publickey%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定引發相同型別事件的最多次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 相同型別事件引發的最多次數。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 這代表時間就會引發相同類型的事件的數目上限。This represents the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值為`10`，則會引發 10 次事件，並略過之後。For example, if the value is `10`, then the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#89)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#89](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#89)]

public: property int MinInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinInstances : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在向提供者引發事件之前，相同事件型別發生的最少次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 向提供者引發事件之前，相同事件型別發生的最少次數。

span.span: The minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 這表示在事件發生之前就會引發事件給提供者最少次數。This represents the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，如果傳回的值是`5`，則 ASP.NET 將不會引發事件給提供者之前就會發生此事件的第五個執行個體。For example, if the return value is `5`, then ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#90)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#90](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#90)]

summary.span: 取得或設定兩個相同型別事件之間的最短時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum time interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: 兩個相同型別事件之間的最短間隔。

span.span: The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The default value is 0 ticks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可以使之成為無限藉由將它設定為。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 如果值為零，則沒有任何最短間隔。If the value is zero, then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
